section.title: Description
section.p: Contains identifying, demographic, and other clinical information for all patients seen in the Audiology and Speech Pathology clinics. The entries in this file are pointers to the Patient file #2. (file 509850.2)

stentry.p: An existing LOCAL file number associated with this Audiology and Speech Pathology patient.
The date of this patient's first visit to the Audiology and/or Speech Pathology clinic at this site.
Identifies ICD-9CM diagnostic condition code for the A&amp;SP patient. Equivalent to a pointer to File 509850.2.
